name: Bacon-Wrapped Shad
keywords: baking potatoes, double smoked bacon, dry white wine, fish, lemon juice, shad, main course, spring
recipeIngredient: 1 2-to-3-pound shad, scaled and cleaned, head and tail intact
3 baking potatoes, cut across into 1/2-inch slices

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 300 degrees. Season the shad inside and out with the pepper. Wrap the fish in bacon until completely covered. Place the shad in a baking pan and add the wine, lemon juice and potatoes. Cover with foil. Bake for 8 to 10 hours, basting every 2 hours. Serve with the potatoes and pan juices.
